text:
="preserve">Mario and Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 is a crossover sports and party game made for the Nintendo Switch.
Releasing on November 1st 2019, this is the sixth game in the Mario and Sonic at the Olympic Games series, a series that is a crossover between Mario from Nintendo and Sonic The Hedgehog from Sega. Alongside the Nintendo Switch, the game released in Arcade cabinets in 2020. The game was revealed in a Nintendo Direct in September 4th 2019.
